description.value:
You gain a new Eikonic Number which serves as your Eikonic Number of Nature (see the “Eikonic Numbers” Cleric Starter Ability for details).

You also gain access to the following Mantras, which can only be assigned to your Eikonic Number of Nature:

  • Paths Less Traveled: Before the end of your next turn, you can move 10 feet once as a non-action on your turn. This does not subtract from your movement for the turn.
  • The Land Heals in Time: You regain 2 hit points.
  • Trust Your Instincts: Your Wisdom (Instinct) checks are increased by +5 for the next minute. You also immediately know which direction is North, and which direction is up.
